title: PE0.9.0为什么有时保存不了
author: zhanshen:dragon
txt_content:
内存有7GB，怎么保存不了呀，不过那时是build 3，更新build 4还不知道呢
求解呀

replies.author: oqqqqqqqqo
replies.txt_content: B3有无法保存的BUG，B4就修复了！

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
